Hello, I'm Esra. I'm working as T2 Analyst and CSOC Engineer. I also working Purple Teamer. I worked on the pentest side at first. Then I started working in the SOC field. I am currently working in both the pentest and the SOC field. In my free time I'm trying to working with Bug Bounty. My favorite interests is joining CTFs.
